analysis.description:
MonethaClaimHandler.close (/unique_chucks/31/0x5773bb32cafe05c9e128d0d37e9adf00f29d0cbb.sol#575-587) uses a dangerous strict equality:
	- State.AwaitingAcceptance == state
	- State.AwaitingResolution == state
	- State.AwaitingConfirmation == state

Reentrancy in MonethaClaimHandler.create (/unique_chucks/31/0x5773bb32cafe05c9e128d0d37e9adf00f29d0cbb.sol#472-509):
	External calls:
	- requesterAllowance = token.allowance(msg.sender,address(this)) (/unique_chucks/31/0x5773bb32cafe05c9e128d0d37e9adf00f29d0cbb.sol#487-489)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- claims (/unique_chucks/31/0x5773bb32cafe05c9e128d0d37e9adf00f29d0cbb.sol#506-508)

Different versions of Solidity is used in /unique_chucks/31/0x5773bb32cafe05c9e128d0d37e9adf00f29d0cbb.sol:
	- Version used: ['^0.4.18', '^0.4.24']
